Loading Stance

Requirement: A weapon with the Loading trait.

Grabbing your weapon and checking it’s loaded, you survey your surroundings for objects to dive behind, both to block shots coming your way, and to stabilize your weapon for when you fire.

Pros

Stabilized Shot

  • While in cover that you can brace your weapon against, your attacks have a +2 to hit.

Entrench

  • While in cover, as a minor action, reload up to two weapons, and gain +1 AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Forward Advance

  • You have +2 to AC and Dexterity (Save) checks while moving to a spot that will give you cover.
  • You gain +15ft movement if your destination would give you cover.

Cons

Slow Loader

  • Reloading your weapon on any turn where you were in this stance requires a Minor Action instead of a Non-Action, and you can only reload once per turn.

Routed

  • Melee attacks have advantage against you.
